description_ru: Профессиональная ретушь для мастера по губам
prompt: Edit the uploaded photo — professional editorial retouch for lip master portfolio. PRESERVE: Face identity 100% identical — facial structure, proportions, age, expression unchanged. LIPS: Absolutely protected — pixel-identical to original. No change to color, tone, temperature, shape, volume, contour, texture, saturation. No lip makeup added. No contour modification. Lips are the master's work — zero interaction, zero enhancement, zero modification. EYELASHES: Pixel-identical — no change to color, curl, density, volume, thickness, length, direction. Absolutely protected from any processing. EYEBROWS: Pixel-identical — no change to shape, color, density, tone, texture. Absolutely protected. HAIR: Unchanged — preserve all texture, position, shine. MAKEUP: Unchanged. SKIN: [SKIN_RETOUCH_LEVEL]. [LIP_DECOR]. [EXTRAS]. BACKGROUND: [BACKGROUND]. QUALITY: Preserve original color correction, temperature, tone. No filters added. Professional studio quality, ultra-photorealistic. Sharp focus. 8K quality. Original dimensions — do not crop or resize.

options.value: Soft gradient from deep rose-gold to warm nude — luxury cosmetic brand aesthetic. Subtle bokeh light particles floating in the background, warm and romantic
Solid deep black background — dramatic high-contrast editorial
Clean solid white studio background — bright, airy, professional
Soft out-of-focus floral background with warm blush tones and scattered petals — romantic beauty campaign feel

Professional editorial retouch. Remove only minor temporary blemishes (acne, redness, spots). Preserve all natural texture — pores, micro-details, vellus hair. Even skin tone, natural glow. No smoothing, no blurring, no airbrushing

Professional editorial retouch. Smooth, hydrated, radiant with natural glow. Natural texture visible — pores preserved, micro-details intact. Remove minor temporary blemishes (acne, redness, spots). Even skin tone, dewy glow. Hydrated editorial glow with subtle highlights. No plastic effect, no airbrushing

Professional editorial retouch. Smooth, hydrated, radiant with natural glow. Natural texture visible — pores preserved, micro-details intact, vellus hair preserved. Remove only minor temporary blemishes (acne, redness, spots). Even skin tone, dewy glow. Hydrated editorial glow with subtle highlights. Micro-contrast enhanced for realistic depth. No plastic effect, no smoothing, no blurring, no airbrushing, no noise reduction. Natural light transitions preserved
ADD: Tiny rhinestones scattered around the lips — realistic, catching light naturally, editorial beauty look. Must NOT touch or modify the lip surface

ADD: Realistic sugar crystals scattered on the lip surface — individual granules catching light, proper transparency and refraction. Sugar must look photorealistic. Lip color, shape and contour underneath remain pixel-identical
Add wet dewy skin effect on face — glistening highlights, fresh hydrated look
Add soft natural freckles across nose and cheeks — delicate, barely noticeable, photorealistic
Add rim light from behind — golden separation light on hair and shoulders for depth
